--- title: "Demographics and Baseline Characteristics (DMT01)" editor: source format: html: page-layout: full code-fold: true code-summary: "Show the code" code-overflow: scroll df-print: kable --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## Calculating DMT01 statstics using the {cards} package In this example below, we calculate the same summary statistics usings the {cards} package with the same data set provided by the {chevron} package. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code code-summary="Show the code"} library(cards) library(chevron) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` Registered S3 method overwritten by 'tern': method from tidy.glm broom ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code code-summary="Show the code"} # build ARDs that calculate relevant statistics for continuous and categorical variables. ards <- ard_stack(syn_data$adsl, ard_continuous(variables = c(AGE)), ard_categorical(variables = c(AGEGR1, SEX, ETHNIC, RACE)), .by = "ARM", .overall = TRUE) ards[, 1:8] ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
